document.full_text: rolls-royce  is set to build a new engine to beef up the a350 jetliner being developed by airbus in a costly rethink of strategy for europe's most ambitious new plane project, industry sources said on monday.
document.title: rolls in costly a350 engine redesign: sources
lines_and_colors: rolls-royce  is set to build a new engine to beef up the a350 jetliner being developed by airbus in a costly rethink of strategy for europe's most ambitious new plane project, industry sources said on monday.
